body.raw:
{
  "query": "mutation ($branch: BranchRequest!) { pharmacy { branch { update(branch: $branch) { id code pharmacyName name openingTime closingTime lat lng } } } }",
  "variables": {
    "branch": {
      "name": "Sta Ana Branch",
      "address": "Pedro Gil St. Sta Ana",
      "city": "Manila",
      "province": "Metro Manila",
      "zipCode": "1009",
      "email": "staana@mercury.com",
      "phoneNumber": "09171234567",
      "contactName": "John Starks",
      "openingTime": "08:00:00.000+08:00",
      "closingTime": "17:00:00.000+08:00",
      "weekEndOpeningTime": "07:00:00.000+08:00",
      "weekEndClosingTime": "20:00:00.000+08:00",
      "lat": 14.582019317323562,
      "lng": 121.01251092551259
    }
  }
}
